title.rendered: Author Q Taylor Unveils Inspiring New Book, “Nineteen Landings: Book 2”

content.rendered:
TAYLOR MILL, KENTUCKY, UNITED STATES, October 24, 2023 /EINPresswire.com/ — Celebrated writer, philosopher, and oil painter, Q Taylor, is delighted to announce the release of his latest literary triumph, “Nineteen Landings: Book 2.” With a life story that has seen the extremes of hardship and triumph, Q Taylor brings his unique perspective to the forefront once again, inspiring and captivating readers with his powerful literary works.

Q Taylor, hailing from Cincinnati, Ohio, has risen from homelessness at the age of 19 to become a successful artist, author, and a proud father of five. His life experiences and tribulations have profoundly influenced his storytelling, shaping him into the remarkable author he is today. With an impressive repertoire of 17 unpublished books, Q Taylor has successfully published and released seven of these works, including the highly acclaimed “Faith’s Destiny,” “Nineteen Landings: Book 1,” “Q’s Motivational Poetry,” “Poetic Q’ures for the Youth,” and “The Black Wormhole.”

“Nineteen Landings: Book 2” continues Q Taylor’s legacy of motivating readers and provoking thought. The book explores alternate possibilities of our current reality. Inside this twisting universe, journey into urban legend, science and conspiracy theory with a cast of unforgettable characters that sometimes face horrific obstacles and intriguing scenarios and promises to leave a lasting impact on all who read it.

“Nineteen Landings: Book 2” is now available on leading platforms including Amazon Kindle, Barnes and Noble, and more.

Members of the media and book reviewers interested in receiving a review copy of “Nineteen Landings: Book 2” are invited to contact Q Taylor directly at qtopianow@aol.com.

Q Taylor is available for interviews and appearances. To schedule an interview or request additional information, please contact Q Taylor at +1 5134884017

About Q Taylor:

Q Taylor is a multi-talented artist, author, and philosopher who has faced and overcome adversity to become a true inspiration. With a background in oil painting and a catalogue of compelling literary works, including “Faith’s Destiny,” “Nineteen Landings,” and “The Black Wormhole,” Q Taylor motivates readers and challenges them to think deeply about life and faith. A proud father of five, he is a real relic of our time, leaving an indelible mark on literature and art.

Book Links:

https://a.co/d/iGdkYEZ

https://a.co/d/0XbyyrH

https://a.co/d/74ZbSqe

Q Taylor
Tolkeins Book Writing
+1 513-488-4017
qtopianow@aol.com

You just read:

News Provided By

October 25, 2023, 00:36 GMT
